channel.title: Error: can't boot whonix
channel.description:
Hi. Whonix was working fine for a while, then today, I got this:
[URL=http://picpaste.novarata.net/#aec23da7b98e4abb4a0fac598eef45c6.png][IMG]http://picpaste.novarata.net/pics/aec23da7b98e4abb4a0fac598eef45c6.png[/img][/URL]
Failed to open a session for the virtual machine Whonix-Gateway.
The virtual machine 'Whonix-Gateway' has terminated unexpectedly during startup with exit code 1.
Result Code: E_FAIL (0x80004005) Component: Machine Interface: IMachine {480cf695-2d8d-4256-9c7c-cce4184fa048}
What can be done about this?
thanks

item.title: Error: can't boot whonix
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Most likely not caused by Whonix, but rather by VirtualBox. First report of that sort ever. So searching the web for that VirtualBox error might help.

Could likely be caused by unclean shutdown or hard drive issues.

Can you check the solution from https://forums.virtualbox.org/viewtopic.php?f=6&t=33196 please and tell us how it went?

Read full topic

item.title: Error: can't boot whonix
item.dc:creator: hord
item.description:
Hi. Whonix was working fine for a while, then today, I got this:

Failed to open a session for the virtual machine Whonix-Gateway.

The virtual machine ‘Whonix-Gateway’ has terminated unexpectedly during startup with exit code 1.

Result Code: E_FAIL (0x80004005)
Component: Machine
Interface: IMachine {480cf695-2d8d-4256-9c7c-cce4184fa048}

What can be done about this?

thanks
